Command History (history, savehistory)

Synopsis

history

savehistory filename

Description

The Change Ringing Engine remembers commands that have been invoked interactively, so they can be recalled for future use. They can be recalled by using the up and down arrow keys.

history lists all successfully run commands, excluding help, shell, savehistory and history itself.

savehistory saves the command history to a filename. This file may be read into future sessions using input.
